title: Rengar's future?
body:
Couple of things;

-Are there any motions towards a new skin for Rengar? Most of the champs released after him now have more skins than he does, excluding the SSW Skin. Is there one in idea/development? 
-As a Rengar main, I speak as a few voices on the rift that all ask the same question; "Why pick Rengar when Kha'Zix is open?" which, above a certain elo, is true; limited help in teamfights unless in the right environment, fairly easy to play around early, and almost entirely relies on picks and not being bullied early game. A few champs have had changes made to help combat these obvious weaknesses, but Rengar does seem to be left a little out of the spotlight. It would be beneficial to help him leave his early game weakness as his late game power isn't all that threatening if the enemy team spends 75g and buys a pink ward. Is there any notion to helping the kitty?

Also yes, he's the "One Shot King" to some people, and whilst I love him dearly I do recognise this is mainly only relevant below plat elo or so, before people start understanding he really isn't that threatening.

Thoughts?

replies.body:
What about Yorick?

The dude hasn't got a skin in years.
Yorick is being reworked, Riot aren't going to release a skin on champ they plan to completely change. They've made this point a few times actually
Yeah, as a Rengar main throughout Season 4 and 5, i gotta admit, Rengar is pretty bad now, his combo's just seem sloppy even being used by pro players. I'm afraid Rengar is dead...
